Cherrycake\Modules\DatabaseProvider::insert

Inserts a row into the specified table on the current database, with the given fields.

    Signature

    public function insert( $tableName, array $fields )

    Parameters

    $tableName —
    $fields — array
    A hash array of field values

    Returns

    mixed
    If everything went ok, the id of the inserted row if the table had an autonumeric field, true if didn't have one. False otherwise.
